Title: Dungeons, Dungeons, & More Dungeons
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Matt Chapman, Josh Weinstein, Alex Hirsch, Zach Paez (additional material written by)
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Jennifer Coolidge
Plot: Dipper finds an unlikely friend to join him with his newest obsession- a nerdy board game called "Dungeons, Dungeons and More Dungeons."
